definitions.definition: to repeat the words that someone else has said or written:
examples: He's always quoting from the Bible.

definitions.definition: If you quote a fact or example, you refer to it in order to add emphasis to what you are saying:
examples: [ + two objects ] Quote me one organization that doesn't have some bad managers.

definitions.definition: the price that a person or company says they will charge to do a piece of work:
examples: I asked several companies to give me a quote for the building work.
